43 template <typename T>
44 using cuda_um_btas_varray = btas::varray<T, TiledArray::cuda_um_allocator<T>>;
45 
46 template <typename T>
47 using cuda_um_thrust_vector =
48  thrust::device_vector<T, TiledArray::cuda_um_allocator<T>>;
49 
51 template <MemorySpace Space, typename Storage>
52 bool in_memory_space(const Storage& vec) noexcept {
53  return overlap(MemorySpace::CUDA_UM, Space);
54 }
55 
60 template <ExecutionSpace Space, typename Storage>
61 void to_execution_space(Storage& vec, cudaStream_t stream = 0) {
62  switch (Space) {
63  case ExecutionSpace::CPU: {
64  using std::data;
65  using value_type = typename Storage::value_type;
66  if (cudaEnv::instance()->concurrent_managed_access()) {
67  CudaSafeCall(cudaMemPrefetchAsync(data(vec),
68  size(vec) * sizeof(value_type),
69  cudaCpuDeviceId, stream));
70  }
71  break;
72  }
73  case ExecutionSpace::CUDA: {
74  using std::data;
75  using value_type = typename Storage::value_type;
76  int device = -1;
77  if (cudaEnv::instance()->concurrent_managed_access()) {
78  CudaSafeCall(cudaGetDevice(&device));
79  CudaSafeCall(cudaMemPrefetchAsync(
80  data(vec), size(vec) * sizeof(value_type), device, stream));
81  }
82  break;
83  }
84  default:
85  throw std::runtime_error("invalid execution space");
86  }
87 }
88 
96 template <typename Storage>
97 void make_device_storage(Storage& storage, std::size_t n,
98  const cudaStream_t& stream = 0) {
99  storage = Storage(n);
100  TiledArray::to_execution_space<TiledArray::ExecutionSpace::CUDA>(storage,
101  stream);
102 }
103 
110 template <typename Storage>
111 typename Storage::value_type* device_data(Storage& storage) {
112  return storage.data();
113 }
114 
121 template <typename Storage>
122 const typename Storage::value_type* device_data(const Storage& storage) {
123  return storage.data();
124 }
125 
126 } // namespace TiledArray

128 namespace madness {
129 namespace archive {
130 
131 // forward decls
132 template <class Archive, typename T>
133 struct ArchiveLoadImpl;
134 template <class Archive, typename T>
135 struct ArchiveStoreImpl;
136 
137 template <class Archive, typename T>
138 struct ArchiveLoadImpl<Archive, TiledArray::cuda_um_thrust_vector<T>> {
139  static inline void load(const Archive& ar,
140  TiledArray::cuda_um_thrust_vector<T>& x) {
141  typename thrust::device_vector<
142  T, TiledArray::cuda_um_allocator<T>>::size_type n(0);
143  ar& n;
144  x.resize(n);
145  for (auto& xi : x) ar& xi;
146  }
147 };
148 
149 template <class Archive, typename T>
150 struct ArchiveStoreImpl<Archive, TiledArray::cuda_um_thrust_vector<T>> {
151  static inline void store(const Archive& ar,
152  const TiledArray::cuda_um_thrust_vector<T>& x) {
153  ar& x.size();
154  for (const auto& xi : x) ar& xi;
155  }
156 };
157 
158 template <class Archive, typename T>
159 struct ArchiveLoadImpl<Archive, TiledArray::cuda_um_btas_varray<T>> {
160  static inline void load(const Archive& ar,
161  TiledArray::cuda_um_btas_varray<T>& x) {
162  typename TiledArray::cuda_um_btas_varray<T>::size_type n(0);
163  ar& n;
164  x.resize(n);
165  for (auto& xi : x) ar& xi;
166  }
167 };
168 
169 template <class Archive, typename T>
170 struct ArchiveStoreImpl<Archive, TiledArray::cuda_um_btas_varray<T>> {
171  static inline void store(const Archive& ar,
172  const TiledArray::cuda_um_btas_varray<T>& x) {
173  ar& x.size();
174  for (const auto& xi : x) ar& xi;
175  }
176 };
177 
178 } // namespace archive
